name: A. Bear and Big Brother
statement:
Bear Limak wants to become the largest of bears, or at least to become
larger than his brother Bob.Right now, Limak and Bob weigh and
respectively. It’s guaranteed that Limak’s weight is smaller than or
equal to his brother’s weight.Limak eats a lot and his weight is tripled
after every year, while Bob’s weight is doubled after every year.After
how many full years will Limak become strictly larger (strictly heavier)
than Bob?
editorial:
This problem is simple: just multiply by and by until . Output the
number of operations. You will not need more than iterations.
